title: Can Distributism Answer Game B's Questions? pt 4 Hilaire Belloc Describes the Distributed State
description:
The operation of a distributed economy (an economy of wide ownership) can be studied historically by looking at the economy built under the influence of the Catholic Church over the course of the Middle Ages and hence may be useful to consider if we wish to recover a distributed economy in our time. Hilaire Belloc describes the gradual abandonment of slavery and the transformation of the Roman villa system into a society of wide economic freedom and dynamism by the end of the Middle Ages.

The Servile State on Amazon: https://amzn.to/31bzWcp

How to pronounce my last name: The "c" is silent just to confuse people.
Bringing Joseph Ratzinger (Benedict XVI) into the converZation in Paul VanderKlay's little corner of the internet.
Introduction to Christianity: https://amzn.to/2A5pvZi
Pope Benedict XVI writings:  https://w2.vatican.va/content/benedict-xvi/en.html
